item.title: Masynctech School - Full Stack Development
item.description: MERN Stack Node.js: JavaScript runtime, runs JavaScript on servers, excels in scalability with its asynchronous, event-driven nature Express.js: web app framework, it is a minimal Node.js framework for web apps, simplifying routing, API creation, and database integration MongoDB: NoSQL database, MongoDB stores data in JSON-like format, is scalable, and provides an intuitive alternative to relational databases React: frontend library, it is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces, emphasizing reusability and efficient UI updates through a virtual DOM
